thread.title_full: Hawaiian Airlines is Most Punctual Airline in the U.S. for JuneTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hawaiian Airlines is Most Punctual Airline in the U.S. for JuneTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hawaiian Airlines is Most Punctual Airline in the U.S. for June Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
Hawaiian Airlines completed the month of June 2015 as the U.S. airline industry’s top-ranked carrier for on-time performance and fewest flight cancellations, as reported today by the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT).
Hawaiian Airlines’ flights arrived on schedule 90.5 percent of the time throughout June, earning the DOT’s top ranking for punctuality. Hawaiian Airlines also ranked first in fewest flight cancellations for the month of June with 0.1 percent, representing 10 cancellations out of 6,677 flights.
Hawai‘i’s largest and longest-serving airline provides daily non-stop service to Hawai‘i from 11 gateway cities in North America – more cities than any other carrier – using Airbus A330-200 and Boeing 767-300 aircraft, making it the only carrier to offer wide-body, twin-aisle aircraft for all transpacific flights. Hawaiian Airlines also operates approximately 160 daily flights between the Hawaiian Islands using Boeing 717-200 aircraft.
Source:- Hawaiian Airlines
